RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 80. Claiming Purse 28000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $14,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Cla im Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BROOKLYN DIAMONDS chased two to three wide coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, swung four wide into upper stretch taking over command, went clear under a drive to prevail. UNION LIGHTS broke out a step at the start brushing CHEEKY TICO, chased three wide under coaxing from the seven-sixteenths, angled five wide into upper stretch, proved no match for the top one while along clear of the rest and second best. CHEEKY TICO got brushed at the start by the aforementioned foe, chased along the inside and then just off the inside coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and improved position to be along for the show honors. KING OF CHAOS showed the way in hand along the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, yielded the front and took the inside route into upper stretch, weakened in the drive. BLU GROTTO a bit fractious in the gate prior to the start, broke towards the front and then faded quickly when striding short and sluggish early on, grew detached at at the tail of the field seven to eight paths off the inside, tucked over to the rail midway down the backstretch and continued along the inside through the turn, cornered two to three wide into upper stretch and passed tired rivals to the finish. CUMBERLAND BLUES broke a beat slow, chased six paths off the inside down the backstretch, tucked five wide into the turn and took the overland route through the bend coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, went seven wide into upper stretch and made no impact. BERT BERT BERT hustled from the gate, chased three to four wide under coaxing from the seven-sixteenths, swung six wide into upper stretch, made no impact. PRINCE OF JOY chased two to three wide coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, angled four to five wide into upper stretch, faltered.

ENTRY.NAME: Bert Bert Bert
ENTRY.OWNER: Three Player's Stable and Barrera III Oscar S
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled st, chased 3-4w, coaxed 7/16, 6w upper, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Cheeky Tico
ENTRY.OWNER: Three Player's Stable and Barrera III Oscar S
ENTRY.COMMENT: brushed st, chased ins, coaxed 2p 3/8, 2w 1/4p, improved

ENTRY.NAME: Brooklyn Diamonds
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2-3w pursuit, coaxed near 1/4, up 4w upper, went clear

ENTRY.NAME: Cumberland Blues
ENTRY.OWNER: Goldfarb Sanford J Speranza Steven and Carney Christopher L
ENTRY.COMMENT: off beat slw, chased 6-5w, coaxed 3/8, 7w upper, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Prince of Joy
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2-3w, coaxed 7/16, 4-5w upper, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Union Lights
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, chased 3w, coaxed 7/16, 5w upper, no match, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: King of Chaos
ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand ins, coaxed 5/16, yielded, ins 1/4, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Blu Grotto
ENTRY.OWNER: Imperio Michael Rodriguez Rudy R and Gurdon Andrew
ENTRY.COMMENT: fractious gate, sluggish 7-8w, ins turn, 2-3w uppr, passed tired

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 87. Claiming Purse 39000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KUPP stumbled at the start, was taken under a tight hold while behind horses early, established a good position behind the solo leader, was asked in the three path midway through the turn, rallied to the lead into upper stretch then drifted out some while moving clear, responded well under a right-handed crop in the final furlong and held under strong urging. HIGH STRIKE was hustled from the start, chased the pace on the outside then in the four path on the turn, pursued the winner in the stretch, gained on that foe in the final sixteenth but missed while able to get the place. JESTER'S SONG settled off the pace, moved in near the nine-sixteenths, advanced closer late on the backstretch, saved ground the turn, hugged the rail into the stretch, pursued the winner in the drive and willingly earned the show. CHARGER was hustled from the gate then urged along on the outside, went five wide on the turn and lacked the needed kick. ON THE COME UP broke out at the start, showed the way with a clear advantage, traveled around the turn in the two path, was headed into upper stretch and tired. ROCK THE WEEKEND was off slow and spotted the front several lengths, raced at the rear while ridden along, went two then three wide on the turn, angled out eight wide into upper stretch and was no factor.

ENTRY.NAME: On the Come Up
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out,clear pace,2path turn,headed into upper stretch,tired

ENTRY.NAME: Rock the Weekend
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow,ridden along at rear,2-3p turn,angled 8w3/16,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Kupp
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled brk,tight hold early,well plcd,3p turn,lead3/16,clr,held

ENTRY.NAME: High Strike
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,chased outside,4path turn,gained late,missed,clear2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Charger
ENTRY.OWNER: La Marca Stable and Rodriguez Rudy R
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,urged outside,5wide turn,lacked needed kick

ENTRY.NAME: Jester's Song
ENTRY.COMMENT: mvd in 4-1/2,closer7/16,inside turn,hugged rail1/4,chased,willing

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 3 6F Outer turf CR: 108. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 105000. OUTER TURF (UP TO $18,270 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 THREE TIMES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON $60,000 IN 2023 OR OPTIONAL CL AIMING PRICE OF $80,000. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Other Than Claiming Or Starter In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race In 2023 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $80,000 (Allowance Horses Preferred)(1.5% Aftercare Assess ment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void). (Rail at 12 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TODAY'S FLAVOR three then two wide in pursuit, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled four wide into upper stretch, rallied to issue a challenge a furlong out, took command a sixteenth from home and dug in gamely head to head to the finish to prevail. NOTHING BETTER coaxed from the gate, showed the way in hand just off the inside, tucked inside into the turn, came under coaxing near the quarter pole, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, dug in under threat and was collared nearing the sixteenth marker, fought on inside to the finish but was ultimately denied at the end. BRING ME A CHECK broke out at the start applying pressure that made lanes tight for both HIGH FRONT and TODAY'S FLAVOR at the start, chased just off the inside until tucked inside into the turn, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and offered up a mild kick. HIGH FRONT stumbled at the start bumping IKIGAI and then got forced to steady when losing his lane conceding two to three lengths to the front, chased three wide until tucked inside into the turn, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three to four wide into upper stretch and offered up a mild bid. IKIGAI got bumped at the start by HIGH FRONT who recovered into him from a stumble, chased three then two wide in closest aim of the leader, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, went three wide into upper stretch, dug in prominent to the eighth pole, then weakened in the late stages. SOSUA SUMMER four paths off the inside down the backstretch, tucked inside with seven-sixteenths to go, cut the corner into upper stretch, came up empty and trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Bring Me a Check
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, chased 2p, coaxed ins 5/16, 2w 1/4p, mild kick

ENTRY.NAME: Nothing Better
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, in hand 2p, ins turn, 2w 1/4, collared 1/16, fought on

ENTRY.NAME: Today's Flavor
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3-2w pursuit, coaxed 5/16, 4w upper, up 1/16, dug in, gamely

ENTRY.NAME: High Front
ENTRY.OWNER: Reeves Thoroughbred Racing Dubb Michael and Bouchey Steven
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled, steadied st, chased 3w, ins turn, 3-4w uppr, mild bid

ENTRY.NAME: Ikigai
ENTRY.OWNER: Ten Strike Racing Four Corners Racing and Cory Moelis Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped st, chased 3-2w, coaxed 5/16, 3w upper, wknd late

ENTRY.NAME: Sosua Summer
ENTRY.OWNER: Wachtel Stable Barber Gary and RT Racing Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4w backstretch, to ins 7/16, cut corner, empty, trailed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 4 7F Dirt CR: 77. Waiver Claiming Purse 28000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $14,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Cl aim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BOSS LADY KIM broke out and brushed the gate, allowed the pacesetter to cross in front early then tracked that foe on the outside, made a bid late on the backstretch, took the lead with three furlongs to run, moved clear while going from the two to three path late on the turn and drew off under steady urging. RACING COLORS settled off the pace, moved out near the five-eighths pole, was urged four wide on the turn, remained on her inside lead until inside the furlong marker then swapped to the proper lead and earned the place. SIMPLE SUGAR bumped with a rival at the start, was reserved behind horses, found clear room in front late on the backstretch, was urged three wide on the turn then driven four wide into the stretch, remained on her inside lead in the drive and lacked the needed response while able to get the show. HIGH SCHOOL CRUSH settled just off the pace, chased inside on the turn and came up empty. ROJA LIGERA broke out and brushed the gate, angled in while going to the front, showed the way down the backstretch, vied inside on the turn, lost the lead with three furlongs to run, dropped back outside the quarter-pole and tired. JUST A NYQUIST bumped with a rival at the start, was hard ridden off the pace, went four then three wide on the turn and failed to threaten. MEMENTO MI dropped well behind, moved from the rail to the two path late on the turn, spun three wide into the stretch and was no factor. SWEET AS SUGAR was well placed just off the pace, dropped back near the five-eighths pole, raced inside to the two path on the turn and capitulated. REDZILLA was urged along on the outside, went three then four wide on the turn and faltered. PER RULING FROM HIWU, RACING COLORS WAS DISQUALIFIED FOR POSITIVE TEST.

ENTRY.NAME: Memento Mi
ENTRY.COMMENT: well behind, ins-2path turn, 3path into lane, no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Simple Sugar
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd brk,behind foes,clr space1/2,urged 3w turn,4w1/4,best rest

ENTRY.NAME: Just a Nyquist
ENTRY.OWNER: Three Player's Stable and Barrera III Oscar S
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start,hard ridden,4-3path turn,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet as Sugar
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed,dropped back 5/8,ins-2path turn,empty

ENTRY.NAME: High School Crush
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled just off pace,inside turn,came up empty

ENTRY.NAME: dq-Racing Colors
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled,mvd out 5/8,urged 4w turn,inside lead to ins1/8,up2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Boss Lady Kim
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out,brshd gate,trckd out,bid7/16,lead3/8,2-3p,drew away

ENTRY.NAME: Redzilla
ENTRY.COMMENT: urged along outside,3-4wide turn,faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Roja Ligera
ENTRY.OWNER: Gurdon Andrew O Poyah Anil and Rodriguez Gustavo
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out,brushed gate,angled in,pace,ins turn,headed3/8,tired

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 5 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 74. Maiden Claiming Purse 38000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $30,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be V oid).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BLUE PLATE SPECIAL coaxed from the gate, chased five paths off the inside down the backstretch and then three wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three wide into upper stretch, shied and drifted out two to three paths straightened away under a left handed crop, dug in rallying to collar the once clear leader seventy yards from the finish and inched away in the late stages to the end. WOODSIDE WARRIOR vied from the four path with a pair to his inside, tucked three wide and dueled with PRIX DE WEST from the seven-sixteenths when shaking away as a pair from BAD LARRY, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, edged clear under a drive to the eighth pole, dug in under lone threat to the outside and was caught seventy yards from the finish, then ran on to be along well clear of the rest and second best. BAD LARRY broke out at the start under coaxing and vied inside a pair down the backstretch, got headed for the front at the seven-sixteenths and faded through the latter portion of the turn under coaxing, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, kept on to come again and secure the show honors. MUNNY FOR NUTHIN chased just off the inside coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled three to four wide into upper stretch, weakened. PRIX DE WEST coaxed from the gate, vied three wide between foes down the backstretch before emerging with sole and narrow command at the seven-sixteenths, dueled through the turn with WOODSIDE WARRIOR to the outside, got headed near the quarter pole and took the inside route into upper stretch, then weakened in the drive. WAR PRINCE broke out at the start and was corrected, chased three to four wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, went seven wide into upper stretch and improved position to the finish. MAJESTIC ARC broke inwards and brushed the near side stall at the start, chased along the inside coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled five wide into upper stretch and tired. TESTA DURA chased three to four paths off the inside down the backstretch and then just off the inside through the turn under coaxing from the three-eighths, swung three wide into upper stretch and tired. DREAM CANTEEN coaxed from the start, chased three then two wide under coaxing from the seven-sixteenths, swung three wide for home, made no impact. IMPULSIVE SPENDING lost his rear footing at the start getting away near the rear, chased just off the inside until tucked inside into the turn, came under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and made no impact.

ENTRY.NAME: Majestic Arc
ENTRY.COMMENT: brushed gate st, chased ins, coaxed 3/8, 5w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Bad Larry
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, vied ins pair, headed 7/16, faded, 2w 1/4p, kept on

ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, chased 3-4w, coaxed 3/8, 7w upper, improved

ENTRY.COMMENT: lost footing st, chased 2p, coaxed ins 7/16, 2w 1/4p, no impact

ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, coaxed 3/8, angled 3-4w upper, weakened

ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3-4w backstretch, 2p turn, coaxed 3/8, 3w upper, tired

ENTRY.OWNER: Bradshaw, Randy and Cheyenne Stables LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, vied 3w betw, dueled 2p turn, inside 1/4, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Dream Canteen
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 3-2w, coaxed 7/16, 3w upper, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Blue Plate Special
ENTRY.OWNER: Rideau Racers LLC and Rice Linda
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, 5w backstretch, 3w turn, 3w upper, up fin 70yds

ENTRY.NAME: Woodside Warrior
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 4p, dueled 3w turn, 2w 1/4p, edged clear, caught, 2nd best

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 6 1 3/16M Outer turf CR: 97. Allowance Purse 100000. OUTER TURF (UP TO $17,400 NYSBFOA) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. No n-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over Allowed 2 lbs. (Rail at 12 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AVENUE NIEL (IRE) moved in while taken under restraint early, was reserved in the two path while traveling comfortably, swung four wide into the stretch, rallied on the outside, closed strongly to get the lead inside the furlong marker, shook clear into the final sixteenth and held under good handling. RHOMBIQUE was reserved on the inside, came under urging on the far turn, was put to a drive in upper stretch, came through inside of the pacesetter in the final furlong and finished fast to get the place. PENTAGON was taken up on the first turn then rated between foes in the two path, came under urging while two then three wide on the final turn, rallied inside of the winner to make a bid into the final furlong but was outfinished while just able to get the show. EMBRACE ME lagged at the rear while saving ground, came out into the stretch then moved further out around the three-sixteenths and finished with good energy to just miss the show. SISTER BRIDGET (IRE) went to the front, dropped from the two path to the rail going around the opening bend, showed the way down the backstretch, was given her cue while inside on the far turn, lost the lead at the quarter-pole, battled under a drive into the final furlong and was outfinished. VIRTUAL REALITY pulled hard under restraint early, was reserved on the inside, came under encouragement on the far turn, chased the vanguard in the stretch and lacked the needed kick. SHE'S MO BUBBLY went three then two wide on the first turn, stalked the pace on the outside, was asked in the two path on the far turn, took a short lead near the quarter-pole, led under a drive into the final furlong then was headed and weakened. BILOXI BLUES was keen under snug restraint early, went four then three wide on the first turn, was rated on the outside, traveled three then four wide while given her cue on the final turn, spun five wide into the stretch and came up empty. TANGENTIAL went three wide on the first turn, was coaxed along on the outside, came up empty in the three path on the far turn and faltered.

ENTRY.NAME: Virtual Reality
ENTRY.COMMENT: pulled hard early,reserved inside,ask2nd turn,chased,outkicked

ENTRY.NAME: Tangential
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3p1st turn,coaxed outside,empty 3p2nd turn,faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Rhombique
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved inside,asked 2nd turn,rail rally,finished fast,up for2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Embrace Me
ENTRY.COMMENT: lagged at rear,inside turns,came out 1/4,mvd out3/16,good energy

ENTRY.NAME: Pentagon
ENTRY.COMMENT: btwn,tkn up1st,ask2-3p2nd,rallied,bid1/8,outfinished,earned show

ENTRY.NAME: Sister Bridget (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2p-ins1st,pace,ask rail 2nd turn,headed1/4,vied past1/8,outfinshd

ENTRY.NAME: Avenue Niel (IRE)
ENTRY.OWNER: Clement Christophe Madaket Stables LLC Dubb Michael and Caruso Michael J
ENTRY.COMMENT: mvd in,reserved 2path,swung 4wide 1/4,rallied,lead ins1/8,held

ENTRY.NAME: Biloxi Blues
ENTRY.COMMENT: keen early,4-3p1st,rated outside,ask 3-4w2nd,5w1/4,empty

ENTRY.NAME: She's Mo Bubbly
ENTRY.OWNER: Low, Lawana L. and Robert E.
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3-2p1st,stlkd outside,ask2p2nd turn,led 1/4-1/8,overtaken,wknd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 80. Starter Allowance Purse 65000. (UP TO $11,310 NYSBFOA) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $50,000 OR LESS AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN OR CLAIMING. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KARA PARA four wide in pursuit, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, advanced to take command near the quarter pole, swung five wide into upper stretch, edged clear under a drive kept to task. BON ADIEU chased along the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three wide into upper stretch before tucking back to the inside near the eighth pole, ran on to procure the place honors. MURSAL chased two to three wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled four wide into upper stretch, dug in under a drive keeping on for the show honors. FREUDIAN chased three to four wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled five to six wide into upper stretch, kicked on belatedly to the finish. JOLLY MISS JILL got brushed at the start by DIAMOND COLLECTOR while under coaxing, dueled from the two path with PROUD FOOT to her inside, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung three wide for home and weakened in the late stages. DOLCE SERA coaxed from the start, chased four to five wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung six wide into upper stretch, weakened. DIAMOND COLLECTOR broke out at the start brushing JOLLY MISS JILL, chased three then two wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, swung four to five wide into upper stretch and tired. PROUD FOOT dueled along the inside of JOLLY MISS JILL, was under a firm left handed grip and being flashed the crop to the right side while floating just off the rail through the turn, succumbed to the pressure and yielded the front at the five-sixteenths marker, took the inside route into upper stretch and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Freudian
ENTRY.OWNER: Beast Mode Racing LLC and Falcone Jr Robert N
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3-4w, coaxed 3/8, 5-6w upper, belatedly

ENTRY.NAME: Dolce Sera
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 4-5w, coaxed 3/8, 6w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Mursal
ENTRY.OWNER: Scuderi, Vincent S. and Gabrielle Farm
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2-3w, coaxed 3/8, 4w upper, dug in, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: Proud Foot
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled ins, firm left grip, shown crop right side turn, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Bon Adieu
ENTRY.OWNER: Werner J Stable and Rodriguez Rudy R
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased ins, coaxed 5/16, 3w upper, to ins 1/8, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: Diamond Collector
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, chased 3-2w, coaxed 3/8, 4-5w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Jolly Miss Jill
ENTRY.OWNER: Ten Strike Racing Four Corners Racing Broadview Stables and Cory Moelis Racing L
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, dueled 2p, coaxed 3/8, 3w upper, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Kara Para
ENTRY.OWNER: Stoneybrook Farm Trust and Potash Edward C
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4w pursuit, coaxed 3/8, up near 1/4, 5w upper, edged clear

RACE.RACE_TEXT: John Hettinger S. BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 8 1 1/8M Turf CR: 95. Stakes Purse 125000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE - BRED REGISTRY.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RUNAWAY RUMOUR was rated in the two path through the first turn, stalked the pace on the outside, made a bid near the half-mile pole, took the lead in the three path at the quarter-pole, responded well under a drive into the final furlong, was guided in closer to the runner-up outside the sixteenth-pole then straightened before contact, fought outside that foe to the wire and just held under strong urging. SPUNGIE was taken under a tight hold early then rated just off the pace on the inside, drafted behind the pacesetter on the far turn, was asked while cutting the corner into the stretch, chased along the rail into the final furlong, had the winner come down close to her outside the sixteenth-pole, battled with that rival to the finish and just missed. WHATLOVELOOKSLIKE went to the front, showed the way on the inside through slow fractions, was asked under threat on the far turn, lost the lead while off the rail into the stretch and was outfinished but willingly earned the show. NEW GINYA saved ground under restraint on the first turn, was reserved off the pace, went two then three wide on the far turn, came four wide into the stretch, pursued the leader while outside in the drive and lacked the needed kick. OUT OF SIGHT broke out at the start, went around the first turn in the three path, was reserved on the outside, traveled three then four wide on the far turn, came five wide into the stretch and lacked the needed response. SARATOGA CHROME broke a bit slow, was reserved while saving ground at the rear, came under urging on the final turn, turned into the stretch in the three path and failed to rally. FOLLOWING THE FINISH, THE RIDER OF SPUNGIE REQUESTED A HOLD ON THE RACE. AFTER THE STEWARDS' REVIEW, NO CHANGE WAS MADE TO THE ORDER OF FINISH

ENTRY.NAME: Whatlovelookslike
ENTRY.COMMENT: clear pace,inside,asked2nd turn,headed1/4,fought on,earned 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: New Ginya
ENTRY.COMMENT: ins1st,reserved,2-3p2nd turn,4w into lane,outkicked

ENTRY.NAME: Runaway Rumour
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated 2path,stalkd outside,bid1/2,lead3p1/4,guided in ins1/8,held

ENTRY.NAME: Saratoga Chrome
ENTRY.OWNER: Campbell David E and Powers Sandra
ENTRY.COMMENT: off bit slow,reserved inside,ask2nd turn,3p1/4,no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Spungie
ENTRY.COMMENT: tight hold,rated ins,ask1/4,chased,bid ins1/8,just missed

ENTRY.NAME: Out of Sight
ENTRY.OWNER: Iselin James L and Gilman Mark P
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out,3p1st,reserved outside,3-4w2nd,5w1/4,outkicked

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 9 6F Outer turf CR: 87. Maiden Special Weight Purse 90000. OUTER TURF (UP TO $15,660 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 119 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred). (Rail at 12 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: APOLLO TEN coaxed from the gate, chased along the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled four wide into upper stretch, rallied to take command a furlong out, dug in tussling with the runner up and gamely inched away in the late stages to prevail. IRISH GENT (IRE) coaxed from the start, showed the way in hand just off the inside widening away on the front, swung three wide into upper stretch, dug in under threat and was collared a furlong from home, battled on inside the top one to the finish getting shaken off a bit in the late going while clear for the place honors. FELTRINELLI chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled five wide into upper stretch, kept on to secure the show honors. REVEREND MOON chased just off the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled three to four wide into upper stretch, stayed on one paced to the finish. RIDGEWOOD RUNNER coaxed from the start, chased along the inside under a ride from the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, weakened. PROSPERO (IRE) chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled three to four wide into upper stretch, passed tired rivals. ASTRAEUS chased five paths off the inside down the backstretch and then three wide through the turn, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung four wide into upper stretch, offered no response. AWESOME FOR SURE chased along the inside coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, took the inside route into upper stretch, offered no response. MIGRATORY chased three to four wide coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, swung three wide into upper stretch, made no impact. GET READY TO ROCK coaxed from the gate, chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung three wide into upper stretch, tired. FINANCIAL DISTRICT coaxed from the gate, chased three to four wide under coaxing from the three-eighths and made no impact. DANGEROUS DRIVER coaxed from the start, chased just off the inside until tucked inside into the turn, came under coaxing three furlongs from home, took the inside route into upper stretch and proved no factor.
